==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|かわ|くち|k2=ぐち|yomi=kun}}

===Etymology===
From [[川]] (''kawa'', "river," "stream," "brook") + [[口]] (''kuchi'', "mouthlike opening")

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|かわぐち|acc=2|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かわぐち}}

# [[mouth]] of [[river]], [[estuary]]

====Alternative forms====
* [[河口]]

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|かわぐち|proper}}

# {{surname|lang=ja|sort=かわぐち}}
# a place name, such as that of Kawaguchi City in [[Saitama]] Prefecture
